---
title: "Read in the SAS"
output: html_notebook
---

first attempt at reading the sas, using `haven`

```{r}
library(haven)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

read it in with `read_sas`

```{r}
cy6_ms_cmb_stu_qqq <- read_sas(
  here("Data", "Raw", "2015",
       "cy6_ms_cmb_stu_qqq.sas7bdat")
  )
```

keep only the columns we agreed upon

```{r}
chunk_2015 <- cy6_ms_cmb_stu_qqq %>%
  select(CNT,
         CNTSCHID,
         CNTSTUID,
         ST005Q01TA,
         ST007Q01TA,
         ST004D01T,
         ST011Q04TA,
         ST011Q06TA,
         PV1MATH,
         PV1READ,
         PV1SCIE,
         W_FSTUWT)
```


and save the results as dataframe in rdata

```{r}
save(chunk_2015, file = here("Data", "Output", "2015",
          "stu_qqq.rda"))
```

Maybe some very preliminary analysis:

```{r}
library(skimr)
library(kable)
skim(chunk_2015) %>%
  kable()
```
